meanings.definition: One of the seven chamberlains whom Ahasuerus commanded to bring in Queen Vashti.
meanings.english_definition: One of the seven chamberlains whom Ahasuerus commanded to bring in Queen Vashti. Mentioned in the Book of Esther.

etymology.value: The etymology of the name Bazatha is uncertain. It is likely of Persian origin, reflecting the setting of the Book of Esther in the Persian court.
